brain dynamics lab @ stanford

We are a computational neuropsychiatry lab dedicated to developing computational methods to better understand brainâ€™s overall dynamical organization in healthy and patient populations. We employ algorithms from a wide range of fields, including Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Machine Learning, Biophysics and Network Science.
